mapper.select: select id, p_num, name, image_url, model, unit, remark, sort, create_time, modified_time, one_category_id, two_category_id, three_category_id, status from biz_product where id = #{id}
select id, p_num, name, image_url, model, unit, remark, sort, create_time, modified_time, one_category_id, two_category_id, three_category_id, status from biz_product where p_num = #{pNum}
mapper.insert: insert into biz_product(id, p_num, name, image_url, model, unit, remark, sort, create_time, modified_time, one_category_id, two_category_id, three_category_id, status) values (#{id}, #{pNum}, #{name}, #{imageUrl}, #{model}, #{unit}, #{remark}, #{sort}, #{createTime}, #{modifiedTime}, #{oneCategoryId}, #{twoCategoryId}, #{threeCategoryId}, #{status})

insert into biz_product(id, p_num, name, image_url, model, unit, remark, sort, create_time, modified_time, one_category_id, two_category_id, three_category_id, status) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.pNum}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.imageUrl}, #{entity.model}, #{entity.unit}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifiedTime}, #{entity.oneCategoryId}, #{entity.twoCategoryId}, #{entity.threeCategoryId}, #{entity.status})

insert into biz_product(id, p_num, name, image_url, model, unit, remark, sort, create_time, modified_time, one_category_id, two_category_id, three_category_id, status) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.pNum}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.imageUrl}, #{entity.model}, #{entity.unit}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifiedTime}, #{entity.oneCategoryId}, #{entity.twoCategoryId}, #{entity.threeCategoryId}, #{entity.status})
on duplicate key update id = values(id), p_num = values(p_num), name = values(name), image_url = values(image_url), model = values(model), unit = values(unit), remark = values(remark), sort = values(sort), create_time = values(create_time), modified_time = values(modified_time), one_category_id = values(one_category_id), two_category_id = values(two_category_id), three_category_id = values(three_category_id), status = values(status)
mapper.update:
update biz_product
id = #{id},
p_num = #{pNum},
name = #{name},
image_url = #{imageUrl},
model = #{model},
unit = #{unit},
remark = #{remark},
sort = #{sort},
create_time = #{createTime},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime},
one_category_id = #{oneCategoryId},
two_category_id = #{twoCategoryId},
three_category_id = #{threeCategoryId},
status = #{status},
where = #{}
